; Home Page Objects
btn_MyAccount=a.account_icon
btn_LogOut=div#account_logout

; Login Page Objects
txtbx_UserName=input#log
txtbx_Password=input#pwd
btn_LogIn=input#login

; Product Page Object
; this is the first form (first product)
menu_Product=nav#main-nav>ul>li:nth-child(2)>a
;frm_Product=form.product_form_ajax.group

; Notify Page Object
btn_GoToCheckout=a.go_to_checkout

; Checkout Page
btn_Continue=div.slide1>a

; Payment Page
select_Country=#current_country
txtbx_Email=input[placeholder='Email']
txtbx_Fname=input[placeholder='First Name']
txtbx_Lname=input[placeholder='Last Name']
txtArea_Addr=textarea[placeholder='Address']
txtbx_City=input[placeholder='City']
txtbx_Pcode=input[placeholder='Postal Code']
txtbx_Phone=input[placeholder='Phone']
chkbx_Billing=input#shippingSameBilling
btn_Purchase=.make_purchase.wpsc_buy_button
;frm_Calc=#change_country

; Confirm Page
finish=
